00221 
00222 template<typename T>
00223 inline StatusCode FileWriter::WriteVariable(const T &t)
00224 {
00225     m_fileStream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&t), sizeof(T));
00226 
00227     if (!m_fileStream.good())
00228         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00229 
00230     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00231 }
00232 
00233 template<>
00234 inline StatusCode FileWriter::WriteVariable(const std::string &t)
00235 {
00236     const unsigned int stringSize(t.size());
00237     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(stringSize));
00238     m_fileStream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(t.c_str()), stringSize);
00239 
00240     if (!m_fileStream.good())
00241         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00242 
00243     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00244 }
00245 
00246 template<>
00247 inline StatusCode FileWriter::WriteVariable(const CartesianVector &t)
00248 {
00249     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(t.GetX()));
00250     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(t.GetY()));
00251     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(t.GetZ()));
00252     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00253 }
00254 
00255 template<>
00256 inline StatusCode FileWriter::WriteVariable(const TrackState &t)
00257 {
00258     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(t.GetPosition()));
00259     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->WriteVariable(t.GetMomentum()));
00260     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00261 }
